General.Name: Sejin Heavy Industries Co Ltd
General.Description: Sejin Heavy Industries Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells shipbuilding equipment in South Korea. It offers deck houses, upper deck units, LPG/LNG cargo tanks, and topside and plant modules, as well as living quarters for the crew of offshore structures. Sejin Heavy Industries Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Ulsan, South Korea.
